attributes.action: Remove illegal immigrants from UK hotels and set up temporary camping sites
attributes.additional_details: We are concerned about the impact that illegal immigrants are having on our communities, and we believe that by moving illegal immigrants to stay in camping sites, taxpayers would have to pay less for their accommodation, and it could deter others from coming to the UK illegally. We want the Government to start putting the UK first, and focus on helping our elderly and homeless, and bringing down our energy bills.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to remove illegal immigrants from staying in hotels and to place them in temporary and secure camping sites whilst they are processed.
